topics.body:
I had the weirdest dream yet. 

I shared the idea of liberty to the entire world through the use of a half eaten chicken bone and when I tried doing so, those who laugh at me, their towns were destroyed by Sonic the Hedgehog who at the very end, chased me down on an open field with his soulless eyes.

Also, Sonic looks like the Garry's Mod model version.
